data.meta_description:
ST59-PDF-ENG - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1) Bloom & Grow was a Hong Kong-based company that distributed maternity, baby, and children's products across Asia. It had grown rapidly in its first 10 years but was still operating using spreadsheets. 

2) The company's CTO, Peter Deacon, was tasked with evaluating whether to implement an ERP system. He analyzed the company's operations and identified inaccuracies caused by the use of spreadsheets across departments. 

3) Peter had significant experience in IT and operations. After assessing Bloom & Grow's workflows, he determined an ERP system was needed to standardize processes and address the issues created by the company's rapid growth.
